   21: %%
   22: -module(ei_connect_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: -include("ei_connect_SUITE_data/ei_connect_test_cases.hrl").
   26: 
   27: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0,
   28:          init_per_testcase/2,
   29:          ei_send/1,
   30:          ei_reg_send/1,
   31:          ei_reg_send_large/1,
   32:          ei_format_pid/1,
   33:          ei_rpc/1,
   34:          rpc_test/1,
   35:          ei_send_funs/1,
   36:          ei_threaded_send/1,
   37:          ei_set_get_tracelevel/1,
   38:          ei_connect_host_port_test/1,
   39:          ei_make_ref/1,
   40:          ei_make_pid/1,
   41:          ei_link_unlink/1]).
   42: 
   43: -import(runner, [get_term/1,send_term/2]).
   44: 
   45: suite() ->
   46:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   47:      {timetrap, {seconds, 30}}].
   48: 
   49: all() ->
   50:     [ei_threaded_send,
   51:      ei_connect_host_port_test,
   52:      {group, default},
   53:      {group, ussi}].
   54: 
   55: groups() ->
   56:     Members = [ei_send,
   57:                ei_format_pid,
   58:                ei_send_funs,
   59:                ei_set_get_tracelevel,
   60:                ei_reg_send,
   61:                ei_reg_send_large,
   62:                ei_rpc,
   63:                ei_make_ref,
   64:                ei_make_pid,
   65:                ei_link_unlink],
   66:     [{default, [], Members},
   67:      {ussi, [], Members}].
   68: 
   69: get_group(Config) ->
   70:     proplists:get_value(name, proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties,Config)).
   71: 
   72: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
   73:     runner:init_per_testcase(?MODULE, Case, Config).
   74: 
   75: ei_send(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   76:     P = runner:start(Config, ?interpret),
   77:     0 = ei_connect_init(P, 42, erlang:get_cookie(), 0, get_group(Config)),
   78:     {ok,Fd} = ei_connect(P, node()),
   79: 
   80:     ok = ei_send(P, Fd, self(), AMsg={a,message}),
   81:     receive AMsg -> ok end,
   82: 
   83:     runner:send_eot(P),
   84:     runner:recv_eot(P),
   85:     ok.
   86: 
   87: ei_format_pid(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   88:     S = self(),
   89:     P = runner:start(Config, ?interpret),
   90:     0 = ei_connect_init(P, 42, erlang:get_cookie(), 0, get_group(Config)),
   91:     {ok,Fd} = ei_connect(P, node()),
   92: 
   93:     ok = ei_format_pid(P, Fd, S),
   94:     receive S -> ok end,
   95: 
   96:     runner:send_eot(P),
   97:     runner:recv_eot(P),
   98:     ok.
   99: 
  100: ei_send_funs(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  101:     P = runner:start(Config, ?interpret),
  102:     0 = ei_connect_init(P, 42, erlang:get_cookie(), 0, get_group(Config)),
  103:     {ok,Fd} = ei_connect(P, node()),
  104: 
  105:     Fun1 = fun ei_send/1,
  106:     Fun2 = fun(X) -> {P, X, Fd, Fun1} end,
  107:     Bits = <<1,2,3:5>>,
  108: 
  109:     AMsg={Fun1,Fun2,Bits},
  110:     %%AMsg={wait_with_funs, new_dist_format},
  111:     ok = ei_send_funs(P, Fd, self(), AMsg),
  112:     EIMsg = receive M -> M end,
  113:     EIMsg = AMsg,
  114: 
  115:     runner:send_eot(P),
  116:     runner:recv_eot(P),
  117:     ok.
  118: 
  119: ei_reg_send(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  120:     P = runner:start(Config, ?interpret),
  121:     0 = ei_connect_init(P, 42, erlang:get_cookie(), 0, get_group(Config)),
  122:     {ok,Fd} = ei_connect(P, node()),
  123: 
  124:     ARegName = a_strange_registred_name,
  125:     register(ARegName, self()),
  126:     ok = ei_reg_send(P, Fd, ARegName, AMsg={another,[strange],message}),
  127:     receive AMsg -> ok end,
  128: 
  129:     runner:send_eot(P),
  130:     runner:recv_eot(P),
  131:     ok.
  132: 
  133: ei_reg_send_large(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  134:     P = runner:start(Config, ?interpret),
  135:     0 = ei_connect_init(P, 42, erlang:get_cookie(), 0, get_group(Config)),
  136:     {ok,Fd} = ei_connect(P, node()),
  137: 
  138:     ARegName = a_strange_registred_name,
  139:     register(ARegName, self()),
  140:     ok = ei_reg_send(P, Fd, ARegName, AMsg={another,[strange],message,
  141:                                             <<0:(32*1024*1024*8)>>}),
  142:     receive AMsg -> ok end,
  143: 
  144:     runner:send_eot(P),
  145:     runner:recv_eot(P),
  146:     ok.
  147: 
  148: ei_threaded_send(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  149:     Einode = filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config), "einode"),
  150:     N = 15,
  151:     Host = atom_to_list(node()),
  152:     TestServerPid = self(),
  153:     [ spawn_link(fun() -> rec_einode(I, TestServerPid) end)
  154:       || I <- lists:seq(0, N-1) ],
  155:     [ receive {I,registered} -> ok end
  156:       || I <- lists:seq(0, N-1) ],
  157:     spawn_link(fun() -> start_einode(Einode, N, Host) end),
  158:     [ receive I -> ok end
  159:       || I <- lists:seq(0, N-1) ],
  160:     ok.
  161: 
  162: rec_einode(N, TestServerPid) ->
  163:     Regname = list_to_atom("mth"++integer_to_list(N)),
  164:     register(Regname, self()),
  165:     TestServerPid ! {N, registered},
  166:     io:format("~p waiting~n", [Regname]),
  167:     receive
  168:         X ->
  169:             io:format("Received by ~s ~p~n", [Regname, X]),
  170:             TestServerPid ! N,
  171:             X
  172:     after 10000 ->
  173:               ct:fail(Regname)
  174:     end.
  175: 
  176: start_einode(Einode, N, Host) ->
  177:     Einodecmd = Einode ++ " " ++ atom_to_list(erlang:get_cookie())
  178:     ++ " " ++ integer_to_list(N) ++ " " ++ Host,
  179:     io:format("Einodecmd  ~p ~n", [Einodecmd]),      
  180:     open_port({spawn, Einodecmd}, []),
  181:     ok.
  182: 
  183: ei_rpc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  184:     P = runner:start(Config, ?interpret),
  185:     0 = ei_connect_init(P, 42, erlang:get_cookie(), 0, get_group(Config)),
  186:     {ok,Fd} = ei_connect(P, node()),
  187: 
  188:     S= "Hej du glade!", SRev = lists:reverse(S),
  189:     X = ei_rpc(P, Fd, self(), {?MODULE, rpc_test}, [SRev]),
  190:     {term, S}= X,
  191: 
  192:     runner:send_eot(P),
  193:     runner:recv_eot(P),
  194:     ok.
  195: 
  196: ei_set_get_tracelevel(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  197:     P = runner:start(Config, ?interpret),
  198:     5 = ei_set_get_tracelevel(P, 5),
  199:     0 = ei_connect_init(P, 42, erlang:get_cookie(), 0, get_group(Config)),
  200:     {ok,Fd} = ei_connect(P, node()),
  201: 
  202:     S= "Hej du glade!", SRev = lists:reverse(S),
  203:     X = ei_rpc(P, Fd, self(), {?MODULE, rpc_test}, [SRev]),
  204:     {term, S}= X,
  205: 
  206:     0 = ei_set_get_tracelevel(P, 0),
  207: 
  208:     runner:send_eot(P),
  209:     runner:recv_eot(P),
  210:     ok.
  211: 
  212: 
  213: ei_connect_host_port_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  214:     P = runner:start(Config, ?interpret),
  215:     0 = ei_connect_init(P, 42, erlang:get_cookie(), 0, default),
  216:     [NodeName, Hostname] = string:lexemes(atom_to_list(node()), "@"),
  217:     {ok, NamePortList} = net_adm:names(),
  218:     {value, {_, Port}}
  219:         = lists:search(fun({N, _}) ->
  220:                                string:equal(N, NodeName)
  221:                        end,
  222:                        NamePortList),
  223:     {ok,Fd} = ei_connect_host_port(P,
  224:                                    erlang:list_to_atom(Hostname),
  225:                                    Port),
  226:     ok = ei_send(P, Fd, self(), AMsg={a,message}),
  227:     receive AMsg -> ok end,
  228: 
  229:     runner:send_eot(P),
  230:     runner:recv_eot(P),
  231:     ok.
  232: 
  233: ei_make_ref(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  234:     P = runner:start(Config, ?interpret),
  235:     0 = ei_connect_init(P, 42, erlang:get_cookie(), 0, get_group(Config)),
  236:     {ok,Fd} = ei_connect(P, node()),
  237: 
  238:     %% Call ei_make_ref() enough times for it to
  239:     %% wrap the first internal integer..
  240: 
  241:     N = 270,
  242:     {CNode, Refs} = make_refs(N, undefined, P, Fd, []),
  243:     io:format("Last Ref ~p~n", [hd(Refs)]),
  244: 
  245:     io:format("CNode = ~p", [CNode]),
  246: 
  247:     true = lists:member(CNode, nodes(hidden)),
  248: 
  249:     %% Ensure that all references are
  250:     %% unique...
  251:     RefsLen = N*1000,
  252:     RefsLen = length(lists:usort(Refs)),
  253: 
  254:     runner:send_eot(P),
  255:     runner:recv_eot(P),
  256:     ok.
  257: 
  258: make_refs(0, CNode, _P, _Fd, Refs) ->
  259:     {CNode, Refs};
  260: make_refs(N, CNode, P, Fd, Refs) ->
  261:     ok = ei_make_refs(P, Fd, self()),
  262:     receive
  263:         {Node, NewRefs} ->
  264:             NewNode = if CNode == undefined ->
  265:                               Node;
  266:                          true ->
  267:                               CNode = Node
  268:                       end,
  269:             make_refs(N-1, NewNode, P, Fd,
  270:                       chk_refs(NewRefs, NewNode, Refs))
  271:     end.
  272: 
  273: chk_refs([], _CNode, Refs) ->
  274:     Refs;
  275: chk_refs([NewRef|NewRefs], CNode, Refs) ->
  276:     true = is_reference(NewRef),
  277:     CNode = node(NewRef),
  278:     chk_refs(NewRefs, CNode, [NewRef|Refs]).
  279: 
  280: ei_make_pid(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  281:     P = runner:start(Config, ?interpret),
  282:     0 = ei_connect_init(P, 42, erlang:get_cookie(), 0, get_group(Config)),
  283:     {ok,Fd} = ei_connect(P, node()),
  284: 
  285:     %%
  286:     %% Ensure to wrap all num values...
  287:     %%
  288:     N = 200,
  289:     {CNode, Pids} = make_pids(N, undefined, P, Fd, []),
  290:     io:format("Last Pid ~p~n", [hd(Pids)]),
  291: 
  292:     io:format("CNode = ~p", [CNode]),
  293: 
  294:     true = lists:member(CNode, nodes(hidden)),
  295: 
  296:     %% Ensure that all pid created by ei_make_pid()
  297:     %% are unique. Note that ei_self() is passed
  298:     %% along in each call as well...
  299:     PidsLen = N*1000 + 1,
  300:     PidsLen = length(lists:usort(Pids)),
  301: 
  302:     runner:send_eot(P),
  303:     runner:recv_eot(P),
  304:     ok.
  305: 
  306: make_pids(0, CNode, _P, _Fd, Pids) ->
  307:     {CNode, Pids};
  308: make_pids(N, CNode, P, Fd, Pids) ->
  309:     ok = ei_make_pids(P, Fd, self()),
  310:     receive
  311:         {Node, NewPids} ->
  312:             NewNode = if CNode == undefined ->
  313:                               Node;
  314:                          true ->
  315:                               CNode = Node
  316:                       end,
  317:             make_pids(N-1, NewNode, P, Fd,
  318:                       chk_pids(NewPids, NewNode, Pids))
  319:     end.
  320: 
  321: chk_pids([], _CNode, Pids) ->
  322:     Pids;
  323: chk_pids([NewPid|NewPids], CNode, Pids) ->
  324:     true = is_pid(NewPid),
  325:     CNode = node(NewPid),
  326:     chk_pids(NewPids, CNode, [NewPid|Pids]).
  327: 
  328: ei_link_unlink(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  329:     P = runner:start(Config, ?interpret),
  330:     0 = ei_connect_init(P, 42, erlang:get_cookie(), 0, get_group(Config)),
  331:     {ok,Fd} = ei_connect(P, node()),
  332: 
  333:     EiPid = ei_self(P),
  334:     io:format("~p ~p~n", [EiPid, node(EiPid)]),
  335: 
  336:     true = lists:member(node(EiPid), nodes(hidden)),
  337: 
  338:     Proc = spawn_link(fun link_srv/0),
  339:     
  340:     Proc ! {link, EiPid},
  341:     ok = ei_recv_signal(P, Fd, link, Proc, EiPid, undefined),
  342: 
  343:     Proc ! {unlink, EiPid},
  344:     ok = ei_recv_signal(P, Fd, unlink, Proc, EiPid, undefined),
  345: 
  346:     unlink(Proc),
  347:     Proc ! {link, EiPid},
  348:     Proc ! {exit, bang},
  349:     ok = ei_recv_signal(P, Fd, link, Proc, EiPid, undefined),
  350:     ok = ei_recv_signal(P, Fd, exit, Proc, EiPid, bang),
  351: 
  352:     runner:send_eot(P),
  353:     runner:recv_eot(P),
  354:     ok.
  355: 
  356: link_srv() ->
  357:     receive
  358:         {link, Pid} ->
  359:             link(Pid);
  360:         {unlink, Pid} ->
  361:             unlink(Pid);
  362:         {exit, Reason} ->
  363:             exit(Reason)
  364:     end,
  365:     link_srv().
  366:                 
  367: 
  368: %%% Interface functions for ei (erl_interface) functions.
  369: 
  370: ei_connect_init(P, Num, Cookie, Creation, SockImpl) ->
  371:     send_command(P, ei_connect_init, [Num,Cookie,Creation,SockImpl]),
  372:     case get_term(P) of
  373:         {term,Int} when is_integer(Int) -> Int
  374:     end.
  375: 
  376: ei_connect(P, Node) ->
  377:     send_command(P, ei_connect, [Node]),
  378:     case get_term(P) of
  379:         {term,{Fd,_}} when Fd >= 0 -> {ok,Fd};
  380:         {term,{-1,Errno}} -> {error,Errno}
  381:     end.
  382: 
  383: ei_connect_host_port(P, Hostname, Port) ->
  384:     send_command(P, ei_connect_host_port, [Hostname, Port]),
  385:     case get_term(P) of
  386:         {term,{Fd,_}} when Fd >= 0 -> {ok,Fd};
  387:         {term,{-1,Errno}} -> {error,Errno}
  388:     end.
  389: 
  390: ei_set_get_tracelevel(P, Tracelevel) ->
  391:     send_command(P, ei_set_get_tracelevel, [Tracelevel]),
  392:     case get_term(P) of
  393:         {term,{tracelevel, Level}} when is_integer(Level) -> Level
  394:     end.
  395: 
  396: ei_send(P, Fd, To, Msg) ->
  397:     send_command(P, ei_send, [Fd,To,Msg]),
  398:     get_send_result(P).
  399: 
  400: ei_format_pid(P, Fd, To) ->
  401:     send_command(P, ei_format_pid, [Fd, To]),
  402:     get_send_result(P).
  403: 
  404: ei_send_funs(P, Fd, To, Msg) ->
  405:     send_command(P, ei_send_funs, [Fd,To,Msg]),
  406:     get_send_result(P).
  407: 
  408: ei_reg_send(P, Fd, To, Msg) ->
  409:     send_command(P, ei_reg_send, [Fd,To,Msg]),
  410:     get_send_result(P).
  411: 
  412: ei_rpc(P, Fd, To, Func, Msg) ->
  413:     send_command(P, ei_rpc, [Fd, To, Func, Msg]),
  414:     get_term(P).
  415: 
  416: ei_make_refs(P, Fd, To) ->
  417:     send_command(P, ei_make_refs, [Fd,To]),
  418:     get_send_result(P).
  419: 
  420: ei_make_pids(P, Fd, To) ->
  421:     send_command(P, ei_make_pids, [Fd,To]),
  422:     get_send_result(P).
  423: 
  424: ei_self(P) ->
  425:     send_command(P, ei_self, []),
  426:     case get_term(P) of
  427:         {term, Pid} when is_pid(Pid) ->
  428:             Pid;
  429:         {term, Unexpected} ->
  430:             io:format("Unexpected return value: ~p", [Unexpected]),
  431:             ct:fail(bad_return_value)
  432:     end.
  433: 
  434: ei_recv_signal(P, Fd, SigType, From, To, Extra) ->
  435:     send_command(P, ei_recv_signal, [Fd, SigType, From, To, Extra]),
  436:     get_send_result(P).
  437: 
  438: get_send_result(P) ->
  439:     case get_term(P) of
  440:         {term,{0,_}} -> ok;
  441:         {term,{1,_}} -> ok;
  442:         {term,{-1,Errno}} -> {error,Errno};
  443:         {term,{Res,Errno}}->
  444:             io:format("Return value: ~p\nerl_errno: ~p", [Res,Errno]),
  445:             ct:fail(bad_return_value)
  446:     end.
  447: 
  448: send_command(P, Name, Args) ->
  449:     runner:send_term(P, {Name,list_to_tuple(Args)}).
  450: 
  451: %%% Test function for RPC
  452: 
  453: rpc_test(S) ->    
  454:     lists:reverse(S).
